metadata.name: Egg
metadata.description: Hatchlingz is a 10,000 NFT collection that has game theory built natively into the smart contracts for metadata distribution, we call this Hatch Game! Each egg has a 1/3 chance to hatch on mint or every time its transferred, bought or sold, and can hatch into 1 of 3 species, Chickens, Dragons or Phoenixes. Hatchlingz Inc. is an incubator that will bring on new and innovative creators, artists, companies, etc. into the Web3 world through NFT as a Service [NaaS], always tying new utility back to Hatchlingz NFT.
